name: sass
//: This is used to track dependencies for the Github Actions tests run on

scripts.js-api-doc-check: npm run tangle && npx ts-node test/js-api-doc-check.ts
scripts.typedoc: npm run tangle && npx typedoc --treatWarningsAsErrors js-api-doc/index.d.ts
scripts.fix: npm run update-toc && npm run markdownlint -- --fix && npm run tangle && gts fix && npm run untangle
scripts.test: npm run tangle && gts lint && tsc --noEmit && npm run toc-check && npm run link-check && npm run js-api-doc-check && npm run typedoc
